ckeditor.description: ~m:CKeditor~ is a free Rich Text editing component from [https://ckeditor.com](https://ckeditor.com). It resembled a mini word processor an is well equipped with features for creating blocks of HTML ready to paste into a web page.%0a%0aThere are 4 commands:%0a%0a~l:attach!ckeditor attach~ creates the editor in an existing ~l:div|k|browser~ element.%0a%0a~l:set!ckeditor set~ sets content into the editor.%0a%0a~l:get!ckeditor get~ retrieves the content when editing is completed.%0a%0a~l:close!ckeditor close~ closes the editor and its parent element returns to its previous state.

attach.description: Attaches a ~l:ckeditor!CKEditor~ element to the specified ~l:div|k|browser~ element, which converts it to a rich text editor.

get.description: Gets the HTML content from the ~l:ckeditor!CKEditor~ and puts it into the named ~l:variable|k|core~.

set.description: Sets the content of the ~l:ckeditor!CKEditor~ to the HTML content provided.
